description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Mentor's Kit
description:
A collection of items to aid in the training of novice adventurers.
Double-click to open.

name: Pact Weapon Container
description: Quartermaster Hargrove presents you with a Pact weapon in gratitude of your service.

name: Clerics Spineguard of Sapphire
description: This equipment goes under armor and can hold an additional upgrade.

name: Berserkers Spineguard of Ruby
description: This equipment goes under armor and can hold an additional upgrade.

name: Rampagers Spineguard of Coral
description: This equipment goes under armor and can hold an additional upgrade.
